Articles.Content:
Ok so i'm just wondering if and if not will Fairing areodynamics be implimented? By that i mean is if you build An areodynamic Stage but on top your satelite or orbiter/SPaceplane has eleron surfaces or was not areodynamic Would puting fairings to cover it up ( like in real life) Change the properties of the section that's inside the fairing to the areodynamics properties of the fairing shape? I hope i'm making sence.

Edited September 28, 2012 by Dermeister
Yes But Not For a LONG time I Think.

Atmospheric modeling is just a placeholder for now (which is why I don't get the point of people trying to build aircraft). I don't think it's on top priority.

Edited September 28, 2012 by Nibb31
